package.name: proposed_aerial_msgs
package.description:
The proposed_aerial_msgs package
This contains the aggregate proposed messages to be tested before being accepted upstream into repositories like common_msgs. Once proven here they can be then merged there.
In particular they are implementing proposed messages from: - REP 147 proposal: https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/rep/pull/120 - REP 145 proposal: https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/rep/pull/186
package.author: Tully Foote
Alejandro Hernandez
